channel.title: SMALL PROBLEM with my server
channel.description: well ive done port forwarding ive made a no-ip.org server and ive got the source run it and it works on 0.0.0.0 port 43594 but if i want ppl 2 come on then do i give em the no-ip one and i use 0.0.0.0 as IP and they're still able 2 log in? im not sure but visit my server so i know its working. abdulscape.no-ip.biz port 43594 or sarascape.no-ip.biz port 43594 it wont let me register on server status page saids i can only register one server sorry =s help plz

item.title: SMALL PROBLEM with my server
item.dc:creator: @wales_00 wales 00
item.description:
@wales_00 wrote:

go into firewall rules and in outbound put 43594 and the ip 192.162.0.1 or 2 or 3

Read full topic

item.title: SMALL PROBLEM with my server
item.dc:creator: @bonzakid bonzakid
item.description:
@bonzakid wrote:

You give them the .no-ip one not the 0.0.0.0 because thats the one they use to get to their own server to log on for themselves so you give them the .no-ip or .biz or whatever you registered with no-ip with.

Read full topic
